ORG.oclc.oai.server.catalog

Class IMSXMLRecordFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • ORG.oclc.oai.server.catalog.RecordFactory
      • ORG.oclc.oai.server.catalog.IMSXMLRecordFactory

  • public class IMSXMLRecordFactory
extends RecordFactory
    IMSXMLRecordFactory converts native XML items to Record objects and vice versa. This factory assumes the native XML item looks exactly like the element of an OAI GetRecord response, with the possible exception that the element contains multiple metadataFormats from which to choose.

      • getAbouts

        public java.util.Iterator getAbouts(java.lang.Object nativeItem)
                             throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Description copied from class: RecordFactory
        Get an Iterator containing all the <about> entries for this native record Return null if the abouts are derived from a source outside the native record itself. In this case, the AbstractCatalog is responsible for obtaining the abouts which can be passed to the create() method along with the nativeItem.
        Specified by:
        getAbouts in class RecordFactory
        Parameters:

        Returns:
